actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1368.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill S.885 to assist the electrical consumers of the Pacific Northwest through use of the Federal Columbia River Power System to achieve cost-effective energy conservation, to encourage the development of renewable energy resources, to establish an adequate power supply, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 885 (Columbia River Power System).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill S.885 to assist the electrical consumers of the Pacific Northwest through use of the Federal Columbia River Power System to achieve cost-effective energy conservation, to encourage the development of renewable energy resources, to establish an adequate power supply, and for other purposes.
